course_title: Adult Gerontology Primary Care NP I
class_notes: Online synchronous sessions via Zoom. Face-to-face intensives dates: TBD
course_description: This course is designed to strengthen assessment, critical thinking and clinical reasoning for common health care diagnoses presenting problems in primary care. Therapeutic interventions, risk management, prevention, and health education are key skills acquired.
prerequisites: NRSG 701D and NRSG 704D and NRSG 706D or equivalent transfer credits as prerequisites
sections: Class Nbr: 1562, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ONLIN, Meets: Meets Online, Instructor: P. Davis, Status: Open
